headline: 'Whiplash-inducing': Trump is 'still sowing chaos' in Pennsylvania GOP politics
author: Bob Brigham
sentences: In Pennsylvanias race for governor, some Republican insiders worry the crowded field could enable someone like Mastriano  a leading election denier who many in the GOP see as a deeply flawed general election candidate  to win the nomination with only a fraction of the vote."
